purpose: Facilitates easy extraction of structured data from web pages.
principle: Uses CSS selectors to define the structure of the data to be scraped, and returns the data in a structured format.
reusability: Can be integrated into any Node.js application for web scraping tasks, supports custom data structures through configuration.
limitations: Limited to static web pages; dynamic content rendered by JavaScript may require additional tools or techniques.
name: scrape-it

highlight: Simplifies web scraping in Node.js with a user-friendly API.
